title: Intellectual Disability (Intellectual Developmental Disorder)
description: A comprehensive guide to Intellectual Disability (Intellectual Developmental Disorder), including diagnosis, management, and clinical considerations based on DSM-5 criteria.
publicSummary: Intellectual Disability (Intellectual Developmental Disorder) is a mental health condition classified in the DSM-5 under Neurodevelopmental Disorders. This content provides educational information based on current clinical guidelines and is not a substitute for professional medical advice.
